word:
John, upon the Isle of Patmos, saw the things which should come upon the earth in the last 
                                                                           92
days. Revelation 13:13;  16:14: "And he doeth great wonders, so that he maketh fire come down from heaven on the earth in the sight of men." "For they are the spirits of devils, working miracles, which go forth unto the kings of the earth and of the whole world, to gather them to the battle of that great day of God Almighty."
